mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders o JOIN services s ON o.`serviceID`=s.`serviceID` JOIN USER u ON s.`userID`=u.`userID` JOIN servicetype st ON s.`stid`=st.stid WHERE o.orderID = #{oid}
SELECT * FROM `servicecollection` sc JOIN services s ON sc.`serviceID`=s.`serviceID` JOIN `user` u ON u.`userID`=s.`userID` WHERE sc.userID = #{uid} ORDER BY sc.`collectionTime` DESC
SELECT * FROM refund r JOIN orders o ON r.`orderID`=o.`orderID` JOIN services s ON s.serviceID = o.`serviceID` WHERE r.userID = #{uid} ORDER BY applicationTime DESC
